page.title: 19SPECIAL EVENTS IN HOLYWELL
page.content: As Holywell is a town with strong R.C. roots it is appropriate that its events start with the{Stations of the {Cross}Procession at Pantasaph on Good Friday.Other religious events during the year are the biennial{St.George's {Day Parade}for Mid-Clwyd hosted by the Holywell scouts and the St.Winefride's Procession in June.Other events are arranged by Charity Groups.Delyn B.C. organise the{May Day Fayre}when local groups participate,shops and people reflecting the theme of Victorian era. The{Delyn Walk,}a nationwide event is organised by the local Air Training Corps and starts and ends in Holywell. The{Tour of Delyn Cycle Race}passes through the town.The{hospital fete}is held in June and crowds are drawn to the August Bank Holiday{Pantasaph {Monastery Fete.}The Rotarians organise the{Christmas Float and the Bonfire.
